metadata.name: Tupac Shakur : The Rose That Grew From Concrete
metadata.description:
"Tupac Shakur : The Rose That Grew From Concrete" NFT Art by Crixtover Edwin.

“Tomorrow I wake with second wind and strong because of pride. I know I fought with all my heart to keep the dream alive.” 26. “All I'm trying to do is survive and make good out of the dirty, nasty, unbelievable lifestyle that they gave me.”. - Tupac Shakur

The symbolism of this piece is a depiction of positive vibes, hustle and growth despite the cards you're dealt with, at the end of the day its your affirmation that matters and what you believe is your birthright. 

Long live the rose that grew from concrete when no one else even cared.

Canvas Size: 91 X 121 cm / 36 x 48 inch

Year: 2022
